1.title: No Game Left Behind Part 1

episode of.title: The Adventures of Silver and Brass (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

1.plot: The Art of Tic-Tac-Toe by Sun Tzu has disappeared from the University Museum of Games. Captain Silver and his sidekick penny Brass are called aboard his airship to reclaim the stolen treasure.

2.title: No Game Left Behind Part 2

episode of.title: The Adventures of Silver and Brass (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

2.plot: After our heroes lose their great airship they manage to find Rob Steel's secret underground lair.

3.title: No Game Left Behind Part 3

episode of.title: The Adventures of Silver and Brass (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

3.plot: Captain Silver and Penny Brass find themselves trapped by the dastardly Rob Steele and are forced to test his game in development. Will they escape?

4.title: No Game Left Behind Part 4

episode of.title: The Adventures of Silver and Brass (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

4.plot: Captain Silver and Penny make one last attempt to recover the stolen treasure from Rob Steel. But Rob Steele wont be defeated so easily.

imdb.plot outline: In this award winning gaming themed spoof on silent movies, "The Art of Tic-Tac-Toe" by Sun Tzu has gone missing from the University Museum of Games. Captain Sterling Silver and his trusty assistant Penny Brass are called into action aboard their airship to reclaim the stolen treasure from the villainous Rob Steele.
imdb.title: The Adventures of Silver and Brass
akas: The Adventures of Silver and Brass (United States)
plot: In this award winning gaming themed spoof on silent movies, "The Art of Tic-Tac-Toe" by Sun Tzu has gone missing from the University Museum of Games. Captain Sterling Silver and his trusty assistant Penny Brass are called into action aboard their airship to reclaim the stolen treasure from the villainous Rob Steele.::anonymous
